title: Legends Never Die 2014 San Antonio Spurs NBA Champions Framed Photo Collage, 11 x 14-Inch, (12367U)
features: Beautifully matted collectors photo presentation, handmade in the USA
Collage contains an 8" x 10" photo, additional 3" x 5" photo and a biography
All photos and bio are bevel-cut and double matted under glass
Comes framed in a beautifully sculpted black lacquered frame ready for hanging
Extra care is given to packing and shipping to prevent glass and/or frame damage
description: Celebrate the 2014 NBA Champion San Antonio Spurs with this beautifully matted collector's photo presentation in an 11" x 14" collage. It contains an 8" x 10" photo offset with an additional 3" x 5" photo, coupled with a bio. All photos and bio are bevel-cut and double matted under glass. These quality collectors pieces are designed for visual appeal. This piece comes framed in a beautifully sculpted black lacquered frame. A unique collectible for any fan and they make a great gift as well.
